songs.lyrics:
[Song Lyrics by Badshah]

[Tags:]
Sez on the beat boy!

[Chorus: Badshah]
Iss saal bas apna he name boy
Iss saal change hone wali game
Iss saal no limit, iss saal no limit
Iss saal no limit, iss saal no limit no
Kuchh bhi nai rehne wala same boy
Iss saal bas ek he hai aim
Iss saal no limit, iss saal no limit
Iss saal no limit, iss saal no limit no x (2)

[Verse 1: Badshah]
Mere sath mere dost yaar
Saari janta confuse aey
Padhte nahi hain akhbaar
Hum hi to bete news hain
Gaadi apni lambi, gaadi apni lambi
4-5 saal nahi paari apni lambi
Kaamyabi ke sath yaari apni lambi
Udd nai raha chhalang maari humne lambi ae
Success 24 ghante mere brain par
Maine ik aur deal sign kari
Tu bus complaint kar
Tay jo kar liya ke jo manzilon tak hai jana
Taangein kaat doge to bhi jaunga main reng kar
Apne dushmanon ki karun durdasha main
Paise ke alawa karun koyi na nasha main
Yaaron ka hoon yaar
Unpe jaan bhi doon vaar
Bas naam ka nahi hoon
Asli mein Badshah main

[Chorus: Badshah]
Iss saal bas apna he name boy
Iss saal change hone wali game
Iss saal no limit, iss saal no limit
Iss saal no limit, iss saal no limit no
Kuchh bhi nai rehne wala same boy
Iss saal bas ek he hai aim
Iss saal no limit, iss saal no limit
Iss saal no limit, iss saal no limit no

[Verse 2: Badshah]
Teri baatein kal ki, meri baatein kal ki
Teri baatein halki, meri baatein bal ki
Maine kabhi body to banayi nahi
Lekin dekho baatein hoti
Meri verses ki muscle ki
Mere gaane sun jalne wale huye salki
Hardwork kiya bhi na ichchha ki kiye phal ki
Forbes ki list mein, GQ ki list mein
2017 tha bas ek jhalki
Gaana aaya “Mercy”
Hit spin of mercy
Meri pehli album ko duniya yeh tarsi
Kiya karoon, karoonga wohi jo meri marzi
2018 competition ki barsi
Hateron mein hawa jo bhari thi kari puncture
Mujhpe hasne walon ke tode maine denture
Kam se kam 9 figure ke business venture
Peechhe se hi le li usne jo tha back-bencher

[Chorus: Badshah]
Iss saal bas apna he name boy
Iss saal change hone wali game
Iss saal no limit, iss saal no limit
Iss saal no limit, iss saal no limit no
Kuchh bhi nai rehne wala same boy
Iss saal bas ek he hai aim
Iss saal no limit, iss saal no limit
Iss saal no limit, iss saal no limit no
songs.title: NO LIMIT
